snippet.title: AC-130 Action-Roguelite! | Metal Thunder Gameplay Trailer | Steam Next Fest Demo |  Wishlist Today
snippet.description:
Metal Thunder - Dumbbell Games
Check out our demo and wishlist on : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3091340/Metal_Thunder/

“Metal Thunder” combines the heart-pounding AC-130 gunship missions from Call of Duty with the excitement of survival games. In this action-packed roguelite, you’ll face endless waves of enemies, adapt to dynamic challenges, and upgrade your arsenal for maximum destruction. Watch the demo, wishlist now on Steam, and get ready for Early Access on October 24!
